item.title: 巴西天气不利，阿拉比卡咖啡升至两个月高点
item.description: 阿拉比卡咖啡期货在纽约升至两个月来的最高水平，原因是担心多次寒冷天气和轻霜可能会抑制头号种植国巴西的产量。【原文：Arabica coffee futures advanced in New York to the highest level in two months on worries multiple bouts of cold weather and light frost could curb output in top grower Brazil.】

item.title: 攻击型无人机制造商斯塔克将因红杉融资而提升估值
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，德国神风特攻队无人机制造商斯塔克防务公司（Stark Defence）正在进行一轮由红杉资本（Sequoia Capital）领投的融资，在成立 18 个月后将其估值提高到 5 亿美元左右。【原文：German kamikaze drone maker Stark Defence is raising a funding round led by Sequoia Capital, boosting its valuation to around $500 million 18 months after its inception, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 减税计划引发财政担忧，印度债券波动性飙升
item.description: 印度基准债券的波动性跃升至三年来的最高点，因为一项削减消费税的计划引发了人们的担忧，即政府可能会出售更多的债务来弥补收入的不足。【原文：Volatility in benchmark Indian bonds jumped to a three-year high, as a plan to cut consumption taxes stoked concerns that the government may sell more debt to make up for any revenue shortfall.】

item.title: 特朗普的外交努力让石油交易商再次提高警惕
item.description:
在美国推动结束俄乌战争的同时，原油市场的 "标题风险 "将持续存在。【原文：

The ‘headline risk’ will persist in crude markets while the US pushes for an end to the Russia-Ukraine war.

】

item.title: TPG 支持前员工创办的科技投资公司 Vanara
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社查阅的一份声明，TPG 公司正在帮助筹建一家名为 Vanara Capital 的新投资管理公司，该公司将投资于处于成长阶段的科技公司。【原文：TPG Inc. is helping to seed a new investment management firm called Vanara Capital that will invest in growth-stage technology companies, according to a statement reviewed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 安克雷奇为信贷机会基金融资 15 亿美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，Anchorage Capital Advisors 已为其最新基金筹集了 15 亿美元，该基金主要投资于受压和不良信贷、特殊情况和结构性信贷。【原文：Anchorage Capital Advisors has raised $1.5 billion for its latest fund that invests in stressed and distressed credit, special situations and structured credit, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 肯尼亚国内债务利率或将延续长达数周的跌势
item.description: 据公司高管称，随着肯尼亚央行继续其宽松周期，肯尼亚国内短期债务证券的收益率在过去一年减半后仍有走低的空间。【原文：Yields on Kenya’s short-term domestic debt securities have room to move lower after halving in the past year as the central bank continues its easing cycle, according to company executives.】

item.title: 亚美尼亚欢迎伊朗在美国支持下与阿塞拜疆发表和平声明
item.description: 亚美尼亚总理对伊朗响应美国斡旋的阿塞拜疆和平声明表示欢迎，并承诺扩大与这个波斯湾国家的经济联系。【原文：Armenia’s premier welcomed Iran’s response to a US-brokered peace declaration with Azerbaijan, pledging to broaden economic ties with the Persian Gulf nation.】

item.title: 皮博迪退出价值 38 亿美元的盎格鲁煤炭资产交易
item.description: 在皮博迪能源公司（Peabody Energy Corp）决定放弃以 38 亿美元收购英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）炼钢煤业务的交易后，英美资源集团的重组计划遭遇重大挫折。【原文：Anglo American Plc suffered a major setback to its restructuring plans after Peabody Energy Corp. decided to walk away from a $3.8 billion deal to buy its steelmaking coal business following a fire at an Australian mine.】

item.title: 领导电池回收失败的 Glencore 交易员离职
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Glencore Plc 回收部门主管库纳尔-辛哈（Kunal Sinha）在解除了该公司与电池金属回收商 Li-Cycle Holdings Corp 不成功的投资合作关系后即将卸任。【原文：Glencore Plc head of recycling Kunal Sinha is stepping down after unwinding the firm’s unsuccessful investment partnership with battery metals recycler Li-Cycle Holdings Corp, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 布莱克希尔斯公司同意以全股票交易方式收购西北能源公司
item.description: 布莱克希尔斯公司同意以全股票交易方式收购另一家美国电力供应商西北能源集团公司。【原文：Black Hills Corp. agreed to acquire another US power supplier, NorthWestern Energy Group Inc., in an all-stock transaction.】

item.title: 英特尔首席执行官获得软银和特朗普的复兴支持
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普要求英特尔公司首席执行官陈立武下台不到两周后，该公司首席执行官有机会获得数十亿美元的新资金，这将有助于他扭转这家陷入困境的美国芯片制造商的局面。【原文：Less than two weeks after President Donald Trump called for the ouster of Intel Corp.’s Lip-Bu Tan, the company’s chief executive officer has a shot at securing billions of dollars in fresh capital that could help him turn around the troubled US chipmaker.】

item.title: Tether 聘用前白宫加密货币顾问海因斯负责美国业务拓展
item.description: Tether Holdings SA 表示，它已任命唐纳德-特朗普总统的数字资产顾问委员会前负责人博-海因斯（Bo Hines）帮助协调其在美国的扩张。【原文：Tether Holdings SA said it had appointed Bo Hines, the former head of President Donald Trump’s digital assets advisory council, to help coordinate its expansion to the United States.】

item.title: 人工智能招聘大潮让初创企业重新思考股权分配问题
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，孙亚洲将探讨初创企业为留住人才而采取的措施。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Yazhou Sun looks at the measures startups are taking to keep talent around.】

item.title: 中国在加拿大经济国策中与澳大利亚周旋
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们关注中国最新的经济策略。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 特朗普扩大钢铁关税征收范围，让进口商面临更多繁文缛节
item.description: 经过多年混乱的贸易战和大流行病造成的供应中断，美国的货运公司、货主和所有使国际商业在世界最大经济体中运转的中间商都很难再受到冲击。【原文：After years of chaotic trade wars and pandemic supply disruptions, it’s hard to rattle American freight carriers, cargo owners and all the middlemen that keep international commerce moving through the world’s largest economy.】

item.title: BC Partners 启动新基金，吸引中等市场交易
item.description: BC Partners Holdings Ltd 的私人信贷部门周二表示，该公司已推出一支新基金，接替其与 Great Lakes 合作成立的 16 亿美元前身基金，投资于中型市场交易。【原文：The private credit arm of BC Partners Holdings Ltd has launched a new fund to succeed its $1.6 billion predecessor created through its partnership with Great Lakes to invest in middle-market deals, the firm said Tuesday.】

item.title: 亚马逊股价落后于痴迷于人工智能的股市
item.description: 在对人工智能痴迷的股市中，亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.【原文：In a stock market obsessed with artificial intelligence, Amazon.com Inc. is losing ground.】

item.title: 欧洲国防股因推动乌克兰和加沙和平而下滑
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）再次推动乌克兰和平，以及哈马斯（Hamas）同意在加沙达成停战协议，欧洲国防类股票周二大幅下挫。【原文：European defense stocks tumbled on Tuesday as Donald Trump’s renewed push for peace in Ukraine and an agreement by Hamas to a truce deal in Gaza put the brakes on their powerful rally.】

item.title: 投资者拥抱风险，SPAC 之王卷土重来
item.description:
查马特-帕利哈皮蒂亚申请以 2.5 亿美元的价格将一家空头支票公司上市。【原文：

Chamath Palihapitiya files for a $250 million listing of a blank-check company.

】

item.title: 第二款电动汽车点燃消费者热情后，小米收入增长 31
item.description: 小米公司成功推出第二款电动汽车，帮助抵消了智能手机需求放缓的影响，该公司季度收入增长 31%，略好于预期。【原文：Xiaomi Corp.’s quarterly revenue rose a slightly better-than-anticipated 31% after the successful launch of its second electric vehicle helped counter slowing demand for smartphones.】

item.title: 期权交易员以 "灾难性 "认沽期权应对科技股大跌
item.description: 期权交易商对未来几周科技股暴跌的担忧与日俱增，他们正在抢购保险，以防一蹶不振。【原文：Options traders are increasingly nervous about a plunge in technology stocks in the coming weeks and are grabbing insurance to protect themselves from a wipeout.】

item.title: Pop Mart 的 Labubu 娃娃狂潮推动收入和利润大幅增长
item.description: 中国毛绒玩具生产商流行玛特国际集团有限公司（Pop Mart International Group Ltd.）公布了强劲的收入和利润增长报告，这主要得益于其广受欢迎的 "拉布布"（Labubu）玩偶的全球需求。【原文：Chinese plush toymaker Pop Mart International Group Ltd. reported robust revenue and profit growth, boosted by global demand for its hugely popular Labubu dolls.】

item.title: 消费价格指数公布前，英国国债收益率创近三个月新高
item.description: 在英国通胀数据公布前，金边债券收益率升至近三个月来的最高点，该数据可能会巩固英国央行今年不会再次降息的理由。【原文：Gilt yields rose to their highest in almost three months ahead of UK inflation data that could cement the case against the Bank of England cutting interest rates again this year.】

item.title: 欧洲新兴市场资产因乌克兰谈判取得进展而上涨
item.description: 周二，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普、乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基和欧洲领导人在华盛顿举行的会晤中，出现了和谈取得进展的迹象，中东欧资产领涨新兴市场。【原文：Assets in central and Eastern Europe led emerging-market gains on Tuesday after signs of progress toward peace talks emerged from a meeting between US President Donald Trump, Ukraine’s Volodymyr Zelenskiy and European leaders in Washington.】

item.title: 麦格理与 Endowus 合作提供基础设施资产
item.description: 据一份声明称，数字财富管理平台 Endowus 正在与麦格理资产管理公司合作，向新加坡和香港的合格投资者推出私人基础设施投资。【原文：Digital wealth management platform Endowus is partnering with Macquarie Asset Management to introduce private infrastructure investments to eligible investors in Singapore and Hong Kong, according to a statement.】

item.title: 特朗普扩大金属关税征收范围，矛头直指婴儿用品和摩托车
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五扩大了钢铝关税的征收范围，将摩托车和餐具等400多种含钢铝金属的消费品纳入征税范围，令物流业震惊不已。美国的报关行和进口商几乎没有收到任何通知，因此无法对周一生效的这一变化作出解释，而且这一变化并不排除过境货物。【原文：President Donald Trump stunned the logistics industry on Friday by widening his steel and aluminum tariffs to include more than 400 consumer items that contain the metals, such as motorcycles and tableware. Customs brokers and importers in the US were given little notice to account for the change, which went into effect Monday and did not exclude goods in transit.】

item.title: 安格连水务（Anglian Water）在监管机构罚款后发行新债券，股本增加
item.description: 安格连水务公司（Anglian Water）将出售近一年来的第一笔英镑基准债券，在英国公用事业行业持续遭遇逆风的情况下，这是对投资者胃口的考验。【原文：Anglian Water is selling its first sterling-denominated benchmark bond in almost a year, testing investor appetite as the UK utility sector continues to navigate headwinds.】

item.title: Trafigura 聘请交易员深耕金银市场
item.description: Trafigura 集团聘请了一支贵金属交易员团队，希望深入高利润的黄金和白银市场。【原文：Trafigura Group has hired a team of precious metals traders as it looks to venture deeper into highly profitable gold and silver markets.】

item.title: 中国铜产量从峰值回落 产能过剩成为关注焦点
item.description: 随着中国政府加大打击工业产能过剩的力度，中国铜产量在上个月出现下降，并从 6 月份创下的历史新高回落。【原文：Chinese copper production fell last month — retreating from a record high in June — as the government ramped up its campaign against industrial overcapacity.】
